content.html: over the last year I’ve come to hate nearly everything about tech- the insipid culture, the lack of diversity of thought, the endless sycophants worshipping vapid thought leaders why did the computer industry become this ugly thing???
content.value:
over the last year I’ve come to hate nearly everything about tech- the insipid culture, the lack of diversity of thought, the endless sycophants worshipping vapid thought leaders

why did the computer industry become this ugly thing???
